application

Class DonationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.DonationManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DonationManagerInterface

    public class DonationManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements DonationManagerInterface
    Manages the donation of donation packages.
    Author:
    Marcus Brooks

      • donatePackage

        public int donatePackage()
                  throws ContainerException,
                         VolunteerException,
                         RecipientException
        Simulates the donation of a donation package. Removes a package from the container, removes a volunteer from the front of the volunteer line and adds them to the back of the volunteer line, removes a recipient from the recipient line.
        Specified by:
        donatePackage in interface DonationManagerInterface
        Returns:
        an integer representing whether the package donation was successful. If not, returns 1 if volunteer line is empty, 2 if recipient line is empty, and 0 if it was successful.
        Throws:
        ContainerException - Thrown if the the container is empty
        VolunteerException - Thrown if the volunteer line is empty
        RecipientException - Thrown if the recipient line is empty
